import React from "react"; import "./Header.scss"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Navbar from "../../components/Navbar/Navbar"; import { useAuth0 } from "@auth0/auth0-react"; const Header = () => { const { user, loginWithRedirect, isAuthenticated, logout } = useAuth0(); console.log("user", user); return ( <>
  • {/* dummy links */} Seller Center
  • {/* dummy links */} Download
  • Follow us on
  • {/* Log Out */} {isAuthenticated ? (
    {user.name}
    ) : ( )}
); }; export default Header;
